casebody.data:
Charles L. RYAN, Director, Arizona Department of Corrections,
v.
Richard D. HURLES. No. 12-1472 (R46-015). Supreme Court of the United States June 3, 2014.

Case below, 706 F.3d 1021.

The petition for writ of certiorari was dismissed today pursuant to Rule 46 of the Rules of this Court.
